title: Scenario design for remote-based trauma resuscitation education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment for active professionals; emphasizes simulation using real trauma patient cases and peer evaluation activities

learning_goals: Learners can apply the basic trauma resuscitation algorithm with ≥ 90% accuracy.
Learners can perform three core clinical skills (airway management, hemorrhage control, shock assessment) with ≥ 80% accuracy using simulation equipment in remote settings.
Learners can write case analysis reports and incorporate peer feedback through PBL team activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
